long.am,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
ğŸ“¢ Create,manage and inject userScript in any website you will

ğŸ”” Top Features
âœª V3 userScript manager
âœª No Signup or permission required
âœª Modern UI design
âœª Lightweight and advanced code editor
âœª Free and Open source: https://github.com/anilkumarum/ScriptRunner
âœª Debug error in script in scriptRunner's console
âœª Swiftly activate and deactivate scripts with just two clicks
âœª Link local script file or folder
âœª Don't ask "read and change all your data on add all websites" Permission.
âœª Install script from userscript sites e.g greasyfork.org, www.userscript.zone, openuserjs.org, github & more
âœª No tracking, no Ads

â„¹ï¸  Enable developer mode at chrome://extensions

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==

Change the web at will with userscripts Userscripts are small programs that modify page layouts, add or remove features, and automate actions to personalize your web experience.

âœ… link local script file
When you edit local file in any ide or text editor, scriptRunner auto-update script.

âœ… Debug error
Debug error in injected script in scriptRunner's console

âœ… ğŸ” Discover Userscripts:
Find a wide array of userscripts at
Paste url link ends with ".user.js".

www.userscript.zone
greasyfork.org
openuserjs.org

â„¹ï¸ Support 
Please report issues on github issues https://github.com/anilkumarum/mark-clipper/issues

Join scriptRunner on google groups: https://groups.google.com/g/scriptrunner

You can mail us: coderrailhelp@gmail.com

ğŸ“¢ Buat, kelola, dan masukkan userScript di situs web mana pun yang Anda inginkan

ğŸ””Fitur Teratas
âœª Manajer skrip pengguna V3
âœª Tidak diperlukan Pendaftaran atau izin
âœª Desain UI modern
âœª Editor kode yang ringan dan canggih
âœª Gratis dan Sumber Terbuka: https://github.com/anilkumarum/ScriptRunner
âœª Kesalahan debug dalam skrip di konsol scriptRunner
âœª Aktifkan dan nonaktifkan skrip dengan cepat hanya dengan dua klik
âœª Tautkan file atau folder skrip lokal
âœª Jangan tanya Izin "baca dan ubah semua data Anda di tambahkan semua situs web".
âœª Instal skrip dari situs skrip pengguna misalnya berminyakfork.org, www.userscript.zone, openuserjs.org, github & lainnya

ğŸ“Œ == FITUR ==

Ubah web sesuka hati dengan skrip pengguna Skrip pengguna adalah program kecil yang mengubah tata letak halaman, menambah atau menghapus fitur, dan mengotomatiskan tindakan untuk mempersonalisasi pengalaman web Anda.

âœ… tautkan file skrip lokal
Saat Anda mengedit file lokal di ide atau editor teks apa pun, skrip pembaruan otomatis scriptRunner.

âœ… Kesalahan debug
Kesalahan debug dalam skrip yang disuntikkan di konsol scriptRunner

ğŸ“¢ Crea, gestisci e inserisci userScript in qualsiasi sito web desideri

ğŸ””Caratteristiche principali
âœª Gestore script utente V3
âœª Nessuna registrazione o autorizzazione richiesta
âœª Design moderno dell'interfaccia utente
âœª Editor di codice leggero e avanzato
âœª Gratuito e open source: https://github.com/anilkumarum/ScriptRunner
âœª Errore di debug nello script nella console di scriptRunner
âœª Attiva e disattiva rapidamente gli script con soli due clic
âœª Collega file o cartelle di script locali
âœª Non chiedere l'autorizzazione "leggi e modifica tutti i tuoi dati su Aggiungi tutti i siti web".
âœª Installa script da siti userscript, ad esempio greasyfork.org, www.userscript.zone, openuserjs.org, github e altro
âœª Nessun tracciamento, nessuna pubblicitÃ

âœ… collega il file di script locale
